25namespace mtl

27namespace
28{
29inline NSUInteger GetMipSize(NSUInteger baseSize, const MipmapNativeLevel level)
30{
31 return std::max<NSUInteger>(1, baseSize >> level.get());
32}
33
34// Asynchronously synchronize the content of a resource between GPU memory and its CPU cache.
35// NOTE: This operation doesn't finish immediately upon function's return.
36template <class T>
37void SyncContent(ContextMtl *context,
38 mtl::BlitCommandEncoder *blitEncoder,
39 const std::shared_ptr<T> &resource)
40{
41#if TARGET_OS_OSX || TARGET_OS_MACCATALYST
42 if (blitEncoder)
43 {
44 blitEncoder->synchronizeResource(resource);
45
46 resource->resetCPUReadMemNeedSync();
47 }
48#endif
49}
50
51template <class T>
52void EnsureContentSynced(ContextMtl *context, const std::shared_ptr<T> &resource)
53{
54#if TARGET_OS_OSX || TARGET_OS_MACCATALYST
55 // Make sure GPU & CPU contents are synchronized.
56 // NOTE: Only MacOS has separated storage for resource on CPU and GPU and needs explicit
57 // synchronization
58 if (resource->get().storageMode == MTLStorageModeManaged && resource->isCPUReadMemNeedSync())
59 {
60 mtl::BlitCommandEncoder *blitEncoder = context->getBlitCommandEncoder();
61 SyncContent(context, blitEncoder, resource);
62 }
63#endif
64}
65
66} // namespace
67// Resource implementation
68Resource::Resource() : mUsageRef(std::make_shared<UsageRef>()) {}
69
70// Share the GPU usage ref with other resource
71Resource::Resource(Resource *other) : mUsageRef(other->mUsageRef)
72{
73 ASSERT(mUsageRef);
74}
75
76void Resource::reset()
77{
78 mUsageRef->cmdBufferQueueSerial = 0;
79 resetCPUReadMemDirty();
80 resetCPUReadMemNeedSync();
81}
82
83bool Resource::isBeingUsedByGPU(Context *context) const
84{
85 return context->cmdQueue().isResourceBeingUsedByGPU(this);
86}
87
88bool Resource::hasPendingWorks(Context *context) const
89{
90 return context->cmdQueue().resourceHasPendingWorks(this);
91}
92
93void Resource::setUsedByCommandBufferWithQueueSerial(uint64_t serial, bool writing)
94{
95 if (writing)
96 {
97 mUsageRef->cpuReadMemNeedSync = true;
98 mUsageRef->cpuReadMemDirty = true;
99 }
100
101 mUsageRef->cmdBufferQueueSerial = std::max(mUsageRef->cmdBufferQueueSerial, serial);
102}
103
104// Texture implemenetation
105/** static */
106angle::Result Texture::Make2DTexture(ContextMtl *context,
107 const Format &format,
108 uint32_t width,
109 uint32_t height,
110 uint32_t mips,
111 bool renderTargetOnly,
112 bool allowFormatView,
113 TextureRef *refOut)
114{
115 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
116 {
117 MTLTextureDescriptor *desc =
118 [MTLTextureDescriptor texture2DDescriptorWithPixelFormat:format.metalFormat
119 width:width
120 height:height
121 mipmapped:mips == 0 || mips > 1];
122 return MakeTexture(context, format, desc, mips, renderTargetOnly, allowFormatView, refOut);
123 } // ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
124}
125
126/** static */
127angle::Result Texture::MakeMemoryLess2DTexture(ContextMtl *context,
128 const Format &format,
129 uint32_t width,
130 uint32_t height,
131 TextureRef *refOut)
132{
133 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
134 {
135 MTLTextureDescriptor *desc =
136 [MTLTextureDescriptor texture2DDescriptorWithPixelFormat:format.metalFormat
137 width:width
138 height:height
139 mipmapped:NO];
140
141 return MakeTexture(context, format, desc, 1, true, false, true, refOut);
142 } // ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
143}
144/** static */
145angle::Result Texture::MakeCubeTexture(ContextMtl *context,
146 const Format &format,
147 uint32_t size,
148 uint32_t mips,
149 bool renderTargetOnly,
150 bool allowFormatView,
151 TextureRef *refOut)
152{
153 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
154 {
155 MTLTextureDescriptor *desc =
156 [MTLTextureDescriptor textureCubeDescriptorWithPixelFormat:format.metalFormat
157 size:size
158 mipmapped:mips == 0 || mips > 1];
159
160 return MakeTexture(context, format, desc, mips, renderTargetOnly, allowFormatView, refOut);
161 } // ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
162}
163
164/** static */
165angle::Result Texture::Make2DMSTexture(ContextMtl *context,
166 const Format &format,
167 uint32_t width,
168 uint32_t height,
169 uint32_t samples,
170 bool renderTargetOnly,
171 bool allowFormatView,
172 TextureRef *refOut)
173{
174 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
175 {
176 MTLTextureDescriptor *desc = [[MTLTextureDescriptor new] ANGLE_MTL_AUTORELEASE];
177 desc.textureType = MTLTextureType2DMultisample;
178 desc.pixelFormat = format.metalFormat;
179 desc.width = width;
180 desc.height = height;
181 desc.mipmapLevelCount = 1;
182 desc.sampleCount = samples;
183
184 return MakeTexture(context, format, desc, 1, renderTargetOnly, allowFormatView, refOut);
185 } // ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
186}
187
188/** static */
189angle::Result Texture::Make2DArrayTexture(ContextMtl *context,
190 const Format &format,
191 uint32_t width,
192 uint32_t height,
193 uint32_t mips,
194 uint32_t arrayLength,
195 bool renderTargetOnly,
196 bool allowFormatView,
197 TextureRef *refOut)
198{
199 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
200 {
201 // Use texture2DDescriptorWithPixelFormat to calculate full range mipmap range:
202 MTLTextureDescriptor *desc =
203 [MTLTextureDescriptor texture2DDescriptorWithPixelFormat:format.metalFormat
204 width:width
205 height:height
206 mipmapped:mips == 0 || mips > 1];
207
208 desc.textureType = MTLTextureType2DArray;
209 desc.arrayLength = arrayLength;
210
211 return MakeTexture(context, format, desc, mips, renderTargetOnly, allowFormatView, refOut);
212 } // ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
213}
214
215/** static */
216angle::Result Texture::Make3DTexture(ContextMtl *context,
217 const Format &format,
218 uint32_t width,
219 uint32_t height,
220 uint32_t depth,
221 uint32_t mips,
222 bool renderTargetOnly,
223 bool allowFormatView,
224 TextureRef *refOut)
225{
226 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
227 {
228 // Use texture2DDescriptorWithPixelFormat to calculate full range mipmap range:
229 uint32_t maxDimen = std::max(width, height);
230 maxDimen = std::max(maxDimen, depth);
231 MTLTextureDescriptor *desc =
232 [MTLTextureDescriptor texture2DDescriptorWithPixelFormat:format.metalFormat
233 width:maxDimen
234 height:maxDimen
235 mipmapped:mips == 0 || mips > 1];
236
237 desc.textureType = MTLTextureType3D;
238 desc.width = width;
239 desc.height = height;
240 desc.depth = depth;
241
242 return MakeTexture(context, format, desc, mips, renderTargetOnly, allowFormatView, refOut);
243 } // ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
244}
245angle::Result Texture::MakeIOSurfaceTexture(ContextMtl *context,
246 const Format &format,
247 uint32_t width,
248 uint32_t height,
249 IOSurfaceRef ref,
250 uint32_t plane,
251 TextureRef *refOut)
252{
253 MTLTextureDescriptor *desc = [[MTLTextureDescriptor new] ANGLE_MTL_AUTORELEASE];
254 desc.textureType = MTLTextureType2D;
255 desc.pixelFormat = format.metalFormat;
256 desc.width = width;
257 desc.height = height;
258 desc.mipmapLevelCount = 1;
259 desc.sampleCount = 1;
260 return MakeTexture(context, format, desc, ref, plane, NO, refOut);
261}
262
263/** static */
264angle::Result Texture::MakeTexture(ContextMtl *context,
265 const Format &mtlFormat,
266 MTLTextureDescriptor *desc,
267 uint32_t mips,
268 bool renderTargetOnly,
269 bool allowFormatView,
270 TextureRef *refOut)
271{
272 return MakeTexture(context, mtlFormat, desc, mips, renderTargetOnly, allowFormatView, false,
273 refOut);
274}
275
276angle::Result Texture::MakeTexture(ContextMtl *context,
277 const Format &mtlFormat,
278 MTLTextureDescriptor *desc,
279 uint32_t mips,
280 bool renderTargetOnly,
281 bool allowFormatView,
282 bool memoryLess,
283 TextureRef *refOut)
284{
285 if(desc.pixelFormat == MTLPixelFormatInvalid)
286 {
287 return angle::Result::Stop;
288 }
289 refOut->reset(new Texture(context, desc, mips, renderTargetOnly, allowFormatView, memoryLess));
290
291 if (!refOut || !refOut->get())
292 {
293 ANGLE_MTL_CHECK(context, false, GL_OUT_OF_MEMORY);
294 }
295 if (!mtlFormat.hasDepthAndStencilBits())
296 {
297 refOut->get()->setColorWritableMask(GetEmulatedColorWriteMask(mtlFormat));
298 }
299
300 return angle::Result::Continue;
301}
302
303angle::Result Texture::MakeTexture(ContextMtl *context,
304 const Format &mtlFormat,
305 MTLTextureDescriptor *desc,
306 IOSurfaceRef surfaceRef,
307 NSUInteger slice,
308 bool renderTargetOnly,
309 TextureRef *refOut)
310{
311 refOut->reset(new Texture(context, desc, surfaceRef, slice, renderTargetOnly));
312
313 if (!(*refOut) || !(*refOut)->get())
314 {
315 ANGLE_MTL_CHECK(context, false, GL_OUT_OF_MEMORY);
316 }
317 if (!mtlFormat.hasDepthAndStencilBits())
318 {
319 refOut->get()->setColorWritableMask(GetEmulatedColorWriteMask(mtlFormat));
320 }
321
322 return angle::Result::Continue;
323}
324
325/** static */
326TextureRef Texture::MakeFromMetal(id<MTLTexture> metalTexture)
327{
328 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE { return TextureRef(new Texture(metalTexture)); }
329}
330
331Texture::Texture(id<MTLTexture> metalTexture)
332 : mColorWritableMask(std::make_shared<MTLColorWriteMask>(MTLColorWriteMaskAll))
333{
334 set(metalTexture);
335}
336
337Texture::Texture(ContextMtl *context,
338 MTLTextureDescriptor *desc,
339 uint32_t mips,
340 bool renderTargetOnly,
341 bool allowFormatView)
342 : Texture(context, desc, mips, renderTargetOnly, allowFormatView, false)
343{}
344
345Texture::Texture(ContextMtl *context,
346 MTLTextureDescriptor *desc,
347 uint32_t mips,
348 bool renderTargetOnly,
349 bool allowFormatView,
350 bool memoryLess)
351 : mColorWritableMask(std::make_shared<MTLColorWriteMask>(MTLColorWriteMaskAll))
352{
353 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
354 {
355 id<MTLDevice> metalDevice = context->getMetalDevice();
356
357 if (mips > 1 && mips < desc.mipmapLevelCount)
358 {
359 desc.mipmapLevelCount = mips;
360 }
361
362 // Every texture will support being rendered for now
363 desc.usage = 0;
364
365 if (context->getNativeFormatCaps(desc.pixelFormat).isRenderable())
366 {
367 desc.usage |= MTLTextureUsageRenderTarget;
368 }
369
370 if (memoryLess)
371 {
372#if (TARGET_OS_IOS || TARGET_OS_TV) && !TARGET_OS_MACCATALYST
373 desc.resourceOptions = MTLResourceStorageModeMemoryless;
374#else
375 desc.resourceOptions = MTLResourceStorageModePrivate;
376#endif
377 }
378 else if (context->getNativeFormatCaps(desc.pixelFormat).depthRenderable ||
379 desc.textureType == MTLTextureType2DMultisample)
380 {
381 // Metal doesn't support host access to depth stencil texture's data
382 desc.resourceOptions = MTLResourceStorageModePrivate;
383 }
384
385 if (!renderTargetOnly)
386 {
387 desc.usage = desc.usage | MTLTextureUsageShaderRead;
388 if (context->getNativeFormatCaps(desc.pixelFormat).writable)
389 {
390 desc.usage = desc.usage | MTLTextureUsageShaderWrite;
391 }
392 }
393 if(desc.pixelFormat == MTLPixelFormatDepth32Float_Stencil8){
394 ASSERT(allowFormatView);
395 }
396
397 if (allowFormatView)
398 {
399 desc.usage = desc.usage | MTLTextureUsagePixelFormatView;
400 }
401
402 set([[metalDevice newTextureWithDescriptor:desc] ANGLE_MTL_AUTORELEASE]);
403
404 mCreationDesc.retainAssign(desc);
405 }
406}
407
408Texture::Texture(ContextMtl *context,
409 MTLTextureDescriptor *desc,
410 IOSurfaceRef iosurface,
411 NSUInteger plane,
412 bool renderTargetOnly)
413 : mColorWritableMask(std::make_shared<MTLColorWriteMask>(MTLColorWriteMaskAll))
414{
415 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
416 {
417 id<MTLDevice> metalDevice = context->getMetalDevice();
418
419 // Every texture will support being rendered for now
420 desc.usage = MTLTextureUsagePixelFormatView;
421
422 if (context->getNativeFormatCaps(desc.pixelFormat).isRenderable())
423 {
424 desc.usage |= MTLTextureUsageRenderTarget;
425 }
426
427#if (TARGET_OS_IOS || TARGET_OS_TV || TARGET_OS_WATCH) && !TARGET_OS_MACCATALYST
428 desc.resourceOptions = MTLResourceStorageModeShared;
429#else
430 desc.resourceOptions = MTLResourceStorageModeManaged;
431#endif
432
433 if (!renderTargetOnly)
434 {
435 desc.usage = desc.usage | MTLTextureUsageShaderRead;
436 if (context->getNativeFormatCaps(desc.pixelFormat).writable)
437 {
438 desc.usage = desc.usage | MTLTextureUsageShaderWrite;
439 }
440 }
441 id<MTLTexture> iosurfTexture = [metalDevice newTextureWithDescriptor:desc
442 iosurface:iosurface
443 plane:plane];
444 set([iosurfTexture ANGLE_MTL_AUTORELEASE]);
445 }
446}
447
448Texture::Texture(Texture *original, MTLPixelFormat format)
449 : Resource(original),
450 mColorWritableMask(original->mColorWritableMask) // Share color write mask property
451{
452 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
453 {
454 auto view = [original->get() newTextureViewWithPixelFormat:format];
455
456 set([view ANGLE_MTL_AUTORELEASE]);
457 }
458}
459
460Texture::Texture(Texture *original, MTLTextureType type, NSRange mipmapLevelRange, NSRange slices)
461 : Resource(original),
462 mColorWritableMask(original->mColorWritableMask) // Share color write mask property
463{
464 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
465 {
466 auto view = [original->get() newTextureViewWithPixelFormat:original->pixelFormat()
467 textureType:type
468 levels:mipmapLevelRange
469 slices:slices];
470
471 set([view ANGLE_MTL_AUTORELEASE]);
472 }
473}
474
475Texture::Texture(Texture *original, const TextureSwizzleChannels &swizzle)
476 : Resource(original),
477 mColorWritableMask(original->mColorWritableMask) // Share color write mask property
478{
479#if defined(__IPHONE_13_0) || defined(__MAC_10_15)
480 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
481 {
482 auto view = [original->get()
483 newTextureViewWithPixelFormat:original->pixelFormat()
484 textureType:original->textureType()
485 levels:NSMakeRange(0, original->mipmapLevels())
486 slices:NSMakeRange(0, original->cubeFacesOrArrayLength())
487 swizzle:swizzle];
488
489 set([view ANGLE_MTL_AUTORELEASE]);
490 }
491#else
492 UNREACHABLE();
493#endif
494}
495
496void Texture::syncContent(ContextMtl *context, mtl::BlitCommandEncoder *blitEncoder)
497{
498 SyncContent(context, blitEncoder, shared_from_this());
499}
500
501void Texture::syncContentIfNeeded(ContextMtl *context)
502{
503 EnsureContentSynced(context, shared_from_this());
504}
505
506bool Texture::isCPUAccessible() const
507{
508#if TARGET_OS_OSX || TARGET_OS_MACCATALYST
509 if (get().storageMode == MTLStorageModeManaged)
510 {
511 return true;
512 }
513#endif
514 return get().storageMode == MTLStorageModeShared;
515}
516
517bool Texture::isShaderReadable() const
518{
519 return get().usage & MTLTextureUsageShaderRead;
520}
521
522bool Texture::supportFormatView() const
523{
524 return get().usage & MTLTextureUsagePixelFormatView;
525}
526
527void Texture::replace2DRegion(ContextMtl *context,
528 const MTLRegion &region,
529 const MipmapNativeLevel &mipmapLevel,
530 uint32_t slice,
531 const uint8_t *data,
532 size_t bytesPerRow)
533{
534 ASSERT(region.size.depth == 1);
535 replaceRegion(context, region, mipmapLevel, slice, data, bytesPerRow, 0);
536}
537
538void Texture::replaceRegion(ContextMtl *context,
539 const MTLRegion &region,
540 const MipmapNativeLevel &mipmapLevel,
541 uint32_t slice,
542 const uint8_t *data,
543 size_t bytesPerRow,
544 size_t bytesPer2DImage)
545{
546 if (mipmapLevel.get() >= this->mipmapLevels())
547 {
548 return;
549 }
550
551 ASSERT(isCPUAccessible());
552
553 CommandQueue &cmdQueue = context->cmdQueue();
554
555 syncContentIfNeeded(context);
556
557 // NOTE(hqle): what if multiple contexts on multiple threads are using this texture?
558 if (this->isBeingUsedByGPU(context))
559 {
560 context->flushCommandBuffer(mtl::NoWait);
561 }
562
563 cmdQueue.ensureResourceReadyForCPU(this);
564
565 if (textureType() != MTLTextureType3D)
566 {
567 bytesPer2DImage = 0;
568 }
569
570 [get() replaceRegion:region
571 mipmapLevel:mipmapLevel.get()
572 slice:slice
573 withBytes:data
574 bytesPerRow:bytesPerRow
575 bytesPerImage:bytesPer2DImage];
576}
577
578void Texture::getBytes(ContextMtl *context,
579 size_t bytesPerRow,
580 size_t bytesPer2DInage,
581 const MTLRegion &region,
582 const MipmapNativeLevel &mipmapLevel,
583 uint32_t slice,
584 uint8_t *dataOut)
585{
586 ASSERT(isCPUAccessible());
587
588 CommandQueue &cmdQueue = context->cmdQueue();
589
590 syncContentIfNeeded(context);
591
592 // NOTE(hqle): what if multiple contexts on multiple threads are using this texture?
593 if (this->isBeingUsedByGPU(context))
594 {
595 context->flushCommandBuffer(mtl::NoWait);
596 }
597
598 cmdQueue.ensureResourceReadyForCPU(this);
599
600 [get() getBytes:dataOut
601 bytesPerRow:bytesPerRow
602 bytesPerImage:bytesPer2DInage
603 fromRegion:region
604 mipmapLevel:mipmapLevel.get()
605 slice:slice];
606}
607
608TextureRef Texture::createCubeFaceView(uint32_t face)
609{
610 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
611 {
612 switch (textureType())
613 {
614 case MTLTextureTypeCube:
615 return TextureRef(new Texture(
616 this, MTLTextureType2D, NSMakeRange(0, mipmapLevels()), NSMakeRange(face, 1)));
617 default:
618 UNREACHABLE();
619 return nullptr;
620 }
621 }
622}
623
624TextureRef Texture::createSliceMipView(uint32_t slice, const MipmapNativeLevel &level)
625{
626 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
627 {
628 switch (textureType())
629 {
630 case MTLTextureTypeCube:
631 case MTLTextureType2D:
632 case MTLTextureType2DArray:
633 return TextureRef(new Texture(this, MTLTextureType2D, NSMakeRange(level.get(), 1),
634 NSMakeRange(slice, 1)));
635 default:
636 UNREACHABLE();
637 return nullptr;
638 }
639 }
640}
641
642TextureRef Texture::createMipView(const MipmapNativeLevel &level)
643{
644 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
645 {
646 NSUInteger slices = cubeFacesOrArrayLength();
647 return TextureRef(
648 new Texture(this, textureType(), NSMakeRange(level.get(), 1), NSMakeRange(0, slices)));
649 }
650}
651
652TextureRef Texture::createViewWithDifferentFormat(MTLPixelFormat format)
653{
654 ASSERT(supportFormatView());
655 return TextureRef(new Texture(this, format));
656}
657
658TextureRef Texture::createViewWithCompatibleFormat(MTLPixelFormat format)
659{
660 return TextureRef(new Texture(this, format));
661}
662
663
664
665TextureRef Texture::createSwizzleView(const TextureSwizzleChannels &swizzle)
666{
667#if ANGLE_MTL_SWIZZLE_AVAILABLE
668 return TextureRef(new Texture(this, swizzle));
669#else
670 WARN() << "Texture swizzle is not supported on pre iOS 13.0 and macOS 15.0";
671 UNIMPLEMENTED();
672 return shared_from_this();
673#endif
674}
675
676MTLPixelFormat Texture::pixelFormat() const
677{
678 return get().pixelFormat;
679}
680
681MTLTextureType Texture::textureType() const
682{
683 return get().textureType;
684}
685
686uint32_t Texture::mipmapLevels() const
687{
688 return static_cast<uint32_t>(get().mipmapLevelCount);
689}
690
691uint32_t Texture::arrayLength() const
692{
693 return static_cast<uint32_t>(get().arrayLength);
694}
695
696uint32_t Texture::cubeFacesOrArrayLength() const
697{
698 if (textureType() == MTLTextureTypeCube)
699 {
700 return 6;
701 }
702 return arrayLength();
703}
704
705uint32_t Texture::width(const MipmapNativeLevel &level) const
706{
707 return static_cast<uint32_t>(GetMipSize(get().width, level));
708}
709
710uint32_t Texture::height(const MipmapNativeLevel &level) const
711{
712 return static_cast<uint32_t>(GetMipSize(get().height, level));
713}
714
715uint32_t Texture::depth(const MipmapNativeLevel &level) const
716{
717 return static_cast<uint32_t>(GetMipSize(get().depth, level));
718}
719
720gl::Extents Texture::size(const MipmapNativeLevel &level) const
721{
722 gl::Extents re;
723
724 re.width = width(level);
725 re.height = height(level);
726 re.depth = depth(level);
727
728 return re;
729}
730
731gl::Extents Texture::size(const ImageNativeIndex &index) const
732{
733 gl::Extents extents = size(index.getNativeLevel());
734
735 if (index.hasLayer())
736 {
737 extents.depth = 1;
738 }
739
740 return extents;
741}
742
743uint32_t Texture::samples() const
744{
745 return static_cast<uint32_t>(get().sampleCount);
746}
747
748angle::Result Texture::resize(ContextMtl *context, uint32_t width, uint32_t height)
749{
750 // Resizing texture view is not supported.
751 ASSERT(mCreationDesc);
752
753 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
754 {
755 MTLTextureDescriptor *newDesc = [[mCreationDesc.get() copy] ANGLE_MTL_AUTORELEASE];
756 newDesc.width = width;
757 newDesc.height = height;
758 id<MTLTexture> newTexture =
759 [[get().device newTextureWithDescriptor:newDesc] ANGLE_MTL_AUTORELEASE];
760
761 ANGLE_CHECK_GL_ALLOC(context, newTexture);
762
763 mCreationDesc.retainAssign(newDesc);
764
765 set(newTexture);
766
767 // Reset reference counter
768 Resource::reset();
769 }
770
771 return angle::Result::Continue;
772}
773
774TextureRef Texture::getLinearColorView()
775{
776 if (mLinearColorView)
777 {
778 return mLinearColorView;
779 }
780
781 switch (pixelFormat())
782 {
783 case MTLPixelFormatRGBA8Unorm_sRGB:
784 mLinearColorView = createViewWithCompatibleFormat(MTLPixelFormatRGBA8Unorm);
785 break;
786 case MTLPixelFormatBGRA8Unorm_sRGB:
787 mLinearColorView = createViewWithCompatibleFormat(MTLPixelFormatBGRA8Unorm);
788 break;
789 default:
790 // NOTE(hqle): Not all sRGB formats are supported yet.
791 UNREACHABLE();
792 }
793
794 return mLinearColorView;
795}
796
797TextureRef Texture::getReadableCopy(ContextMtl *context,
798 mtl::BlitCommandEncoder *encoder,
799 const uint32_t levelToCopy,
800 const uint32_t sliceToCopy,
801 const MTLRegion &areaToCopy)
802{
803 gl::Extents firstLevelSize = size(kZeroNativeMipLevel);
804 if (!mReadCopy || mReadCopy->get().width < static_cast<size_t>(firstLevelSize.width) ||
805 mReadCopy->get().height < static_cast<size_t>(firstLevelSize.height))
806 {
807 // Create a texture that big enough to store the first level data and any smaller level
808 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
809 {
810 auto desc = [[MTLTextureDescriptor new] ANGLE_MTL_AUTORELEASE];
811 desc.textureType = get().textureType;
812 desc.pixelFormat = get().pixelFormat;
813 desc.width = firstLevelSize.width;
814 desc.height = firstLevelSize.height;
815 desc.depth = 1;
816 desc.arrayLength = 1;
817 desc.resourceOptions = MTLResourceStorageModePrivate;
818 desc.sampleCount = get().sampleCount;
819 desc.usage = MTLTextureUsageShaderRead | MTLTextureUsagePixelFormatView;
820
821 id<MTLTexture> mtlTexture = [context->getMetalDevice() newTextureWithDescriptor:desc];
822 mReadCopy.reset(new Texture(mtlTexture));
823 } // ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
824 }
825
826 ASSERT(encoder);
827
828 encoder->copyTexture(shared_from_this(), sliceToCopy, levelToCopy, mReadCopy, 0,
829 0, 1, 1);
830
831 return mReadCopy;
832}
833
834void Texture::releaseReadableCopy()
835{
836 mReadCopy = nullptr;
837}
838
839TextureRef Texture::getStencilView()
840{
841 if (mStencilView)
842 {
843 return mStencilView;
844 }
845
846 switch (pixelFormat())
847 {
848 case MTLPixelFormatStencil8:
849 case MTLPixelFormatX32_Stencil8:
850#if TARGET_OS_OSX || TARGET_OS_MACCATALYST
851 case MTLPixelFormatX24_Stencil8:
852#endif
853 return mStencilView = shared_from_this();
854#if TARGET_OS_OSX || TARGET_OS_MACCATALYST
855 case MTLPixelFormatDepth24Unorm_Stencil8:
856 mStencilView = createViewWithDifferentFormat(MTLPixelFormatX24_Stencil8);
857 break;
858#endif
859 case MTLPixelFormatDepth32Float_Stencil8:
860 mStencilView = createViewWithDifferentFormat(MTLPixelFormatX32_Stencil8);
861 break;
862 default:
863 UNREACHABLE();
864 }
865
866 return mStencilView;
867}
868
869void Texture::set(id<MTLTexture> metalTexture)
870{
871 ParentClass::set(metalTexture);
872 // Reset stencil view
873 mStencilView = nullptr;
874 mLinearColorView = nullptr;
875}
876
877// Buffer implementation
878angle::Result Buffer::MakeBuffer(ContextMtl *context,
879 size_t size,
880 const uint8_t *data,
881 BufferRef *bufferOut)
882{
883
884 return MakeBufferWithSharedMemOpt(context, false, size, data, bufferOut);
885}
886
887angle::Result Buffer::MakeBufferWithSharedMemOpt(ContextMtl *context,
888 bool forceUseSharedMem,
889 size_t size,
890 const uint8_t *data,
891 BufferRef *bufferOut)
892{
893 bufferOut->reset(new Buffer(context, forceUseSharedMem, size, data));
894
895 if (!(*bufferOut) || !(*bufferOut)->get())
896 {
897 ANGLE_MTL_CHECK(context, false, GL_OUT_OF_MEMORY);
898 }
899
900 return angle::Result::Continue;
901}
902
903angle::Result Buffer::MakeBufferWithResOpt(ContextMtl *context,
904 MTLResourceOptions options,
905 size_t size,
906 const uint8_t *data,
907 BufferRef *bufferOut)
908{
909 bufferOut->reset(new Buffer(context, options, size, data));
910
911 if (!(*bufferOut) || !(*bufferOut)->get())
912 {
913 ANGLE_MTL_CHECK(context, false, GL_OUT_OF_MEMORY);
914 }
915
916 return angle::Result::Continue;
917}
918
919Buffer::Buffer(ContextMtl *context, bool forceUseSharedMem, size_t size, const uint8_t *data)
920{
921 (void)resetWithSharedMemOpt(context, forceUseSharedMem, size, data);
922}
923
924Buffer::Buffer(ContextMtl *context, MTLResourceOptions options, size_t size, const uint8_t *data)
925{
926 (void)resetWithResOpt(context, options, size, data);
927}
928
929angle::Result Buffer::reset(ContextMtl *context, size_t size, const uint8_t *data)
930{
931 return resetWithSharedMemOpt(context, false, size, data);
932}
933
934angle::Result Buffer::resetWithSharedMemOpt(ContextMtl *context,
935 bool forceUseSharedMem,
936 size_t size,
937 const uint8_t *data)
938{
939 MTLResourceOptions options;
940
941 options = 0;
942#if TARGET_OS_OSX || TARGET_OS_MACCATALYST
943 if (!forceUseSharedMem || context->getDisplay()->getFeatures().forceBufferGPUStorage.enabled)
944 {
945 options |= MTLResourceStorageModeManaged;
946 }
947 else
948#endif
949 {
950 options |= MTLResourceStorageModeShared;
951 }
952
953 return resetWithResOpt(context, options, size, data);
954}
955
956angle::Result Buffer::resetWithResOpt(ContextMtl *context,
957 MTLResourceOptions options,
958 size_t size,
959 const uint8_t *data)
960{
961 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
962 {
963 id<MTLBuffer> newBuffer;
964 id<MTLDevice> metalDevice = context->getMetalDevice();
965
966 if (data)
967 {
968 newBuffer = [metalDevice newBufferWithBytes:data length:size options:options];
969 }
970 else
971 {
972 newBuffer = [metalDevice newBufferWithLength:size options:options];
973 }
974
975 set([newBuffer ANGLE_MTL_AUTORELEASE]);
976
977 // Reset command buffer's reference serial
978 Resource::reset();
979
980 return angle::Result::Continue;
981 }
982}
983
984void Buffer::syncContent(ContextMtl *context, mtl::BlitCommandEncoder *blitEncoder)
985{
986 SyncContent(context, blitEncoder, shared_from_this());
987}
988
989const uint8_t *Buffer::mapReadOnly(ContextMtl *context)
990{
991 return mapWithOpt(context, true, false);
992}
993
994uint8_t *Buffer::map(ContextMtl *context)
995{
996 return mapWithOpt(context, false, false);
997}
998
999uint8_t *Buffer::mapWithOpt(ContextMtl *context, bool readonly, bool noSync)
1000{
1001 mMapReadOnly = readonly;
1002
1003 if (!noSync)
1004 {
1005 CommandQueue &cmdQueue = context->cmdQueue();
1006
1007 EnsureContentSynced(context, shared_from_this());
1008
1009 if (this->isBeingUsedByGPU(context))
1010 {
1011 context->flushCommandBuffer(mtl::NoWait);
1012 }
1013
1014 cmdQueue.ensureResourceReadyForCPU(this);
1015 }
1016
1017 return reinterpret_cast<uint8_t *>([get() contents]);
1018}
1019
1020void Buffer::unmap(ContextMtl *context)
1021{
1022 flush(context, 0, size());
1023
1024 // Reset read only flag
1025 mMapReadOnly = true;
1026}
1027
1028void Buffer::unmapNoFlush(ContextMtl *context)
1029{
1030 mMapReadOnly = true;
1031}
1032
1033void Buffer::unmapAndFlushSubset(ContextMtl *context, size_t offsetWritten, size_t sizeWritten)
1034{
1035#if TARGET_OS_OSX || TARGET_OS_MACCATALYST
1036 flush(context, offsetWritten, sizeWritten);
1037#endif
1038 mMapReadOnly = true;
1039}
1040
1041void Buffer::flush(ContextMtl *context, size_t offsetWritten, size_t sizeWritten)
1042{
1043#if TARGET_OS_OSX || TARGET_OS_MACCATALYST
1044 if (!mMapReadOnly)
1045 {
1046 if (get().storageMode == MTLStorageModeManaged)
1047 {
1048 size_t startOffset = std::min(offsetWritten, size());
1049 size_t endOffset = std::min(offsetWritten + sizeWritten, size());
1050 size_t clampedSize = endOffset - startOffset;
1051 if (clampedSize > 0)
1052 {
1053 [get() didModifyRange:NSMakeRange(startOffset, clampedSize)];
1054 }
1055 }
1056 }
1057#endif
1058}
1059
1060size_t Buffer::size() const
1061{
1062 return get().length;
1063}
1064
1065bool Buffer::useSharedMem() const
1066{
1067 return get().storageMode == MTLStorageModeShared;
1068}
1069}
